mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO(COM_CODE, APPROVE_STATE, APPROVE_DATE, AUTH_TYPE, POINT,REG_DW_USER_IDX,UP_DW_USER_IDX) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{APPROVE_STATE}, sysdate, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{POINT}, #{REG_DW_USER_IDX}, #{UP_DW_USER_IDX})

INSERT INTO SC_AUDIT_ITEM_POINT(COM_CODE, AUDIT_ID, AUTH_TYPE, POINT, AUDIT_COMMENT, AUTH_SEQ, REG_COM_USER_IDX, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUDIT_ID}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{POINT}, #{AUDIT_COMMENT}, #{AUTH_SEQ}, #{REG_COM_USER_IDX}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO where AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
select COUNT(*) from SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO where AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SC_AUTH_FILE(COM_CODE, AUTH_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, AUTH_SEQ) VALUES (#{COM_CODE}, #{AUTH_TYPE}, #{FILE_NAME}, #{FILE_PATH}, #{AUTH_SEQ})
mapper.select: SELECT CC.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, ACI.APPROVE_STATE, ACI.APPROVE_DATE, ACI.SEND_DATE, ACI.POINT, ACI.AUTH_SEQ FROM SC_COMPANY_CODE CC LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND ACI.AUTH_TYPE = #{AUTH_TYPE} WHERE CC.COM_CODE = #{COM_CODE}

SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, ACI.AUTH_TYPE, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as APPROVE_DATE, POINT, AF.FILE_NAME, AF.FILE_PATH, AF.FILE_TYPE, AF.AUTH_SEQ FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_AUTH_FILE AF ON AF.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE AND AF.AUTH_TYPE = ACI.AUTH_TYPE WHERE ACI.AUTH_TYPE=#{AUTH_TYPE} and ACI.COM_CODE=#{COM_CODE}

SELECT ACI.COM_CODE, CC.COM_NAME, AUTH_TYPE, AUDIT_WAY, APPROVE_STATE, TO_CHAR(APPROVE_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS APPROVE_DATE, TO_CHAR(SEND_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS SEND_DATE, TO_NUMBER(POINT, '999999.0') AS POINT FROM SC_AUTH_COMPANY_INFO ACI INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE CC ON CC.COM_CODE = ACI.COM_CODE WHERE 1 =1
AND (ACI.COM_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_CODE}), '%'))
AND (CC.COM_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ACI.APPROVE_STATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{COM_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (ACI.AUTH_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{AUTH_TYPE}), '%'))
